description:
Luffy and his crew are finally reunited and ready to rescue Robin, but the raven-haired beauty remains reluctant to rejoin her former mates despite Franky`s urging.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Give Us Your Answer, Robin! The Straw Hats` Outcry!
Kotaero Robin! Mugiwara Ichimi no Sakebi!!
Réponds-nous, Robin ! Le cri du cœur des pirates au chapeau de paille !
Дай свой ответ, Робин! Призыв команды Соломенной Шляпы!
答えろロビン! 麦わら一味の叫び!!
